mapper.select: select i.item_name as itemName,i.id as itemId,s.session_id as sessionId,s.sort ,g.group_name as groupName from tc_game_session_item as s left join tc_game_item as i on i.id = s.item_id left join tc_game_group as g on g.id = i.group_id where s.session_id = #{sessionId} and s.game_id = #{gameId} order by sort
select session_id from tc_game_session_item where game_id = #{gameId} group by session_id
